Class CreditCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • CreditCard

  • public class CreditCard
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple model for a consumer credit card.

      • CreditCard

        public CreditCard(java.lang.String customer,
                  java.lang.String bank,
                  java.lang.String account,
                  int limit)
        Constructs a new credit card instance.
        Parameters:
        customer - the name of the customer (e.g., "John Doe")
        bank - the name of the bank (e.g., "Bank of America")
        account - the account number (e.g., "8573920")
        limit - the credit limit (measured in dollars)
